properties.description: 2 FRIDAYS A MONTH UNTIL DECEMBER - then every friday 12.30-3.30pmA small cosy warm space with home made soup, sandwiches, games, chess, fun and friendship wednesday and sundays sessions are hot food support sessions mainly for the homeless, and vulnerable but for anyone needing signposting for support Over 18 We are an over 18 provision, Wednesdays and Sundays hot food, free or donation, Fridays home made soup and sandwiches, free or donation, chess and board games. Advice, support and listening ear at all sessions!
properties.title: Helen Robinson

properties.address: 20 Station Road, Colwyn Bay, Conwy LL29 8BU
properties.description: Room@20 is a community space for people to come and find support in a variety of ways - it might be you just need a space to sit or get some advice. We can pray with you if you want. Everyone welcome.
properties.title: Room@20

properties.description: With funding from Community Foundation Wales, our Hwb Grwst space is open all year round every Tuesday (from 9th April) between 12.30pm and 4.30pm providing hot drinks, with a basic hot snack such as cheese toasties / beans on toast etc, a warm space with free WiFi, accessible toilets, charging facilities, board games, and friendly volunteers to chat to. All within the beautiful surroundings of our historic, Grade I listed 15th Century church. Our Paned a Sgwrs (Cuppa & Chat) coffee morning is open every Thursday between 10am and 12pm providing modestly-priced hot drinks and cake.
properties.title: St Grwst's Church, Llanrwst
